pageContext.claim: “Senator Mitch McConnell should fight for the Wall and Border Security as hard as he fought for anything. He will need Democrat votes, but as shown in the House, good things happen. If enough Dems don't vote, it will be a Democrat Shutdown! House Republicans were great yesterday!”
pageContext.analysis: A shutdown was avoidable. Congressional leaders thought they had had an agreement with the president to push the funding dispute over a border wall until the new year until Trump upended it after pressure from his right flank. Trump had previously said he would proudly take responsibility for a shutdown but now he's trying to shift responsibility. Plus, Democrats have signaled they support some increased border security measures, just not the wall, which experts say wouldn't be effective in stopping illegal immigration or drug trafficking.
